value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Use advanced data options and connectors in Power Apps
value.excerpt: Do you want to improve the user's experience in your canvas app? Do you want to use custom connectors to connect to data? This learning path will help you do both things. It will also focus on working with data source limits.

topItems.title: Work with relational data in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to work with relational data in Power Apps canvas apps.

topItems.title: Work with data source limits (delegation limits) in a Power Apps canvas app

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use custom connectors in a Power Apps canvas app.

value.title: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 data​
value.excerpt: Connect and analyze your Dynamics 365 Data​

value.title: Perform custom updates in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: With some Power Apps canvas apps, a form is not the solution.  This module will focus on how to perform custom updates when your data is not in a form.

value.title: Complete testing and performance checks in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Do you want to test your app and improve it's performance? This module will help you understand how to test an app and improve performance.

value.title: Microsoft Power Platform Mobile management
value.excerpt: As the world becomes more mobile, understanding Microsoft Power Platform mobile capabilities allows functional consultants not only ensure seamless access from mobile devices, but also take advantage of its unique form factor when implementing Dynamics 365 solutions.

value.title: Connecting to other data in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect to other data in Power Apps canvas app.

value.title: Work with data source limits (delegation limits) in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Delegate data with Power Apps.

value.title: Administer Microsoft Power Platform subscriptions
value.excerpt: Many organizations implementing Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement apps on the Microsoft Power Platform are unaware of the amazing capabilities included with their subscription. By default, your subscription includes Microsoft Portals, Gamification, and Voice of the Customer surveys, in addition to technical capabilities like backup and restore, and integrated planning for updates and upgrades. This module focuses on showcasing the great default capabilities you have access to.

value.title: Author an advanced formula that uses tables, records, and collections in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: Do you have need for a complex formula in your app? This module can help you author that formula.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Work with relational data in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with relational data in Power Apps canvas apps.

value.title: Use imperative development techniques for canvas apps in Power Apps
value.excerpt: Learn how to use imperative vs. declarative development.

value.title: Design Microsoft Power Platform Dynamics 365 Deployments
value.excerpt: Design and deploy Microsoft Dynamics 365 apps on the Microsoft Power Platform. Best Practices during this process will decrease the chances of technical issues in the future related to poor application lifecycle management process and storage limitations. The first step before the customization and configuration of the solution takes place is the configuration of your online tenant and online environment

value.title: Author a basic formula that uses tables and records in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Learn how to author a basic formula that uses tables and records in a Power Apps canvas app.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Write data in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Learn how to write data in a Power Apps canvas app.

value.title: Use basic formulas to make better Power Apps canvas apps
value.excerpt: Do you want to use formulas to improve functionality and change a behavior in your Power Apps canvas app? This learning path can help you accomplish your goal.

topItems.title: Author a basic formula to change properties in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Want to enhance your Power Apps canvas app? You can use basic formulas to make changes to control properties.  This will include changing the format, position, simple calculations, and implementing conditional formatting.

topItems.title: Author a basic formula to change behaviors in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to author a basic formula to change behaviors in a Power Apps canvas app.

topItems.title: Author a basic formula that uses tables and records in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to author a basic formula that uses tables and records in a Power Apps canvas app.

value.title: Author a basic formula to change behaviors in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Learn how to author a basic formula to change behaviors in a Power Apps canvas app.

value.title: Work with data in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: Do you need to connect an app to access data? Then this learning path is for you. It will focus on how to connect to data sources. It also will show you how to use filtering, conditions, and other functions to shape your data and write data to your data source.

topItems.title: Work with external data in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Do you need to connect an app to access data? Then this module is for you. It focuses on connecting your app to a data source.

topItems.title: Shape data in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: When you create a canvas app, do you need to show the user all the data? What if you want to show only the data that is relevant to them? This module will help you address this issue.

topItems.title: Write data in a Power Apps canvas app
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to write data in a Power Apps canvas app.

value.title: Create and manage entities in Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Common Data Service entities are similar to tables in a database. Every instance of a Common Data Service database includes a base set of entities that provide structure for data that is commonly used by business applications.

value.title: Shape data in a Power Apps canvas app
value.excerpt: When you create a canvas app, do you need to show the user all the data? What if you want to show only the data that is relevant to them? This module will help you address this issue.

value.title: Use and understand Controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: Controls help create a better experience for the user and collect the appropriate data. This module will help you understand and use Controls.

value.title: Use developer tools to extend the Power Platform
value.excerpt: This module will focus on the available developer tools that can help you perform development activities with the Microsoft Power Platform.

value.title: Extending the Power Platform Common Data Service
value.excerpt: Getting started with extending the Power Platform Common Data Service can be overwhelming. This learning path looks at the tools and resources needed for extending the Power Platform. We'll start with looking at the SDKs, the extensibility model, and event framework. This learning path also covers when to use plug-ins. Configuration of plug-ins as well as registering and deploying plug-ins.

topItems.title: Introduction to Common Data Service for developers
topItems.excerpt: The goal of this module is to give an introductory overview of the Power Platform SDKs that are available from Microsoft via NuGet.

topItems.title: Extend plug-ins
topItems.excerpt: The purpose of this module is to provide an in-depth overview of plug-ins as it relates to Power Platform development. This module will review how and when plug-ins are implemented, how they are registered and deployed, and the various configuration options that are available during plug-in registration.

value.title: Use the UI and controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: The app user experience often defines the success of your app. This learning path will focus on how to provide the best app navigation, and build the best UI using themes, icons, images, personalization, different form factors, and controls.

topItems.title: Navigation in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: App users can only navigate through the navigation options provided by an app developer, and this module is designed to help you build a good navigation experience for your canvas app.

topItems.title: How to build the UI in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: Do you want to build a better UI for app users? This module helps you do that using themes, icons, images, personalization, different form factors, and controls.

topItems.title: Use and understand Controls in a canvas app in Power Apps
topItems.excerpt: Controls help create a better experience for the user and collect the appropriate data. This module will help you understand and use Controls.

value.title: How to build the UI in a canvas app in Power Apps
value.excerpt: Do you want to build a better UI for app users? This module helps you do that using themes, icons, images, personalization, different form factors, and controls.

value.title: Extend plug-ins
value.excerpt: The purpose of this module is to provide an in-depth overview of plug-ins as it relates to Power Platform development. This module will review how and when plug-ins are implemented, how they are registered and deployed, and the various configuration options that are available during plug-in registration.

value.title: Introduction to developing with Power Platform
value.excerpt: So, you want to be a Power Platform developer! This learning path is the first step in learning about the platform, tools, and the ecosystem of Power Platform.

topItems.title: Introduction to Power Platform developer resources
topItems.excerpt: The goal of this module is to give a broad-scoped overview of the developer experience as it relates to the Power Platform.  It will cover a high-level introduction how the ecosystem is represented, with the intended audience being a software developer with limited experience in working with the Power Platform.

topItems.title: Use developer tools to extend the Power Platform
topItems.excerpt: This module will focus on the available developer tools that can help you perform development activities with the Microsoft Power Platform.

topItems.title: Introduction to extending the Microsoft Power Platform
topItems.excerpt: This module will focus on the underlying solution architecture from a technical perspective and what extensibility options exist. It will also cover the ever-important element of the Microsoft Power Platform development, which is the decision-making process of determining when to use configuration versus code.

value.title: Introduction to extending the Microsoft Power Platform
value.excerpt: This module will focus on the underlying solution architecture from a technical perspective and what extensibility options exist. It will also cover the ever-important element of the Microsoft Power Platform development, which is the decision-making process of determining when to use configuration versus code.
